ValidationRule.description: Downtime should be added at closure
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId = "0126f0000014VPS", NOT(ISBLANK(Reported_Issues__c)), ISBLANK(Downtime_minutes__c), OR(TEXT( Status__c ) = "Closed - Completed [Off-Hours]", TEXT( Status__c ) = "Closed - Completed [Business Hours]", TEXT( Status__c ) = "Closed - Completed [Mixed]"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter the amount of time the stream was down due to the reported issues. If none, enter 0.
